# <i class="bi bi-box-seam"></i> R packages 
## {cnefetools}

![](images/cnefetools-hex.png){width="150" style="float: left; margin-right: 15px; margin-bottom: 10px;"} The *Cadastro Nacional de Endereços para Fins Estatísticos* (CNEFE) is a comprehensive address register compiled by IBGE as part of the Brazilian Census, covering every dwelling and establishment in the country. **{cnefetools}** is an R package that provides functions to download and read municipality-level CNEFE data, spatially aggregate addresses, compute land-use mix indices, and perform dasymetric interpolation of census tract variables using CNEFE dwelling points as ancillary data. Results can be produced on H3 hexagonal grids or user-supplied polygons, and heavy operations leverage a DuckDB backend for fast, in-process execution.

[GitHub](https://github.com/pedreirajr/cnefetools){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-sm} [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=cnefetools){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-sm} [Vignettes](pedreirajr.github.io/cnefetools/){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-sm}
